sentence.Network_cn: 全球化正为西方的增长形成难以克服的阻力.

sentence.Network_cn: 晚上顶风是最值得担心的.

entry.def: A headwind is a wind which blows in the opposite direction to the one in which you are moving.

means.word_mean: 1. wind blowing opposite to the path of a ship or aircraft
